Title: Nine and a Half Minutes
Plot: One bar, three different points of view, the same nine and a half minutes. Susan and Steve are pregnant (mostly Susan), Patrick and Sally are discussing relationships (mostly Sally), and Jane has a blind date - but will his job be a problem? Meanwhile, in the skies above an Aegean island, terrible danger grows.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Robin Kermode, Amanda Abbington, Pandora Colin
